title: Farm work: equipment maintenance. Ep. 2. Reconditionog a mower (drive system)
creator_credit: Calvin Productions and United States. Office of Education
brief_description: How to remove, clean, lubricate and replace the wheel assembly; how to remove and replace the flywheel shaft and bearings; how to replace the wrist pin; how to disassemble, clean and replace gear assembly; how to lubricate the drive system.
